text: In Greek mythology, Otrera (; , Otrērē) was a queen of the Amazons. She was the daughter of Eurus (the east wind). She was a lover of the god Ares. Their children were Hippolyta, Antiope, Melanippe, and Penthesilea.Bibliotheca, Epitome of Book IV, 5. 1Hyginus, Fabulae, 30; 112 == References == Category:People in Greek mythology
title: Otrera
